## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-960">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-960">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-961">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-961">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-962">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-962">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="639c8-963">net"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-963">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-964">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-964">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-965">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-965">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="639c8-966">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-966">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-967">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-967">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-968">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-968">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-969">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-969">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-970">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-970">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-971">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-971">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-972">43 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-972">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-973">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-973">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-974">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-975">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-975">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-976">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-977">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-977">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-978">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-978">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-979">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-979">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-994">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-994">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-995">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-996">字符串"sig"后跟下面模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-996">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-997">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-997">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-998">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-998">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-999">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-999">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1000">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1000">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1001">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1001">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1002">小写字母或大写字母、数字或百分号之间的 43-53 个字符的任意组合 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1002">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1003">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1003">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1004">不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的任何字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1004">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1005">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1006">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1006">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1007">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1008">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1008">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1024">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1024">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1025">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1025">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1026">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1026">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1027">43 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1027">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1028">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1028">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1029">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1029">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1030">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1030">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1031">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1031">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1032">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1032">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1033">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1033">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1034">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1034">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1049">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1049">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1050">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1050">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1051">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1051">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1052">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1052">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1053">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1053">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1054">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1054">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1055">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1055">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1056">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1056">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1057">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1057">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1058">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1058">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1059">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1059">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1060">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1060">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1061">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1061">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1062">86 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1062">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1063">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1063">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1064">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1065">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1065">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1066">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1067">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1067">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1068">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1068">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1069">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1069">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1070">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1070">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1076"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1076">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1088">Azure 存储帐户密钥 (通用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1088">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1089">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1090">86 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1090">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1091">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1091">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1092">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1092">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1093">86 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1093">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1094">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1094">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1095">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1096">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1096">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1097">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1098">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1098">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1099">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1099">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1100">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1100">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1102">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1102">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1103">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1104">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1104">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1105">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1106">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1106">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1107">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1108">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1108">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1109">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1109">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1110">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1110">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1243">比利时国家/区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1243">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1244">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1244">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1245">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1245">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1246">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1246">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1247">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1247">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1248">YY 格式的六个数字和两个可选句点。MM.DD出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1248">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1249">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1249">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1250">三个连续的数字 (为男性的奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1250">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1251">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1251">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1252">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1252">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1253">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1254">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1254">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1255">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1256">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1257">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1257">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1258">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1258">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1259">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1259">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1260">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1260">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1261">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1261">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1262">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1262">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1321">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1321">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1322">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1323">两个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1323">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1324">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1325">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1325">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1326">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1326">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1327">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1327">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1328">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1328">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1329">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1329">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1330">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1330">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1331">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1331">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1332">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` DD MM YY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1332">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1333">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1333">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1334">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1334">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1335">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1335">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1359">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1359">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1360">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1360">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1361">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1361">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1362">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1362">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1363">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1363">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1364">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1364">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1365">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1365">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1366">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1367">12 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1367">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1368">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1369">12 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1369">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1370">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1370">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1371">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1371">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1372">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1372">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1373">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1373">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1374">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1374">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1375">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1375">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1376">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1376">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1377">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1377">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1378">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1379">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1379">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1380">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1381">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1382">该函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1382">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1383">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1383">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1384">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1384">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1385">该函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1385">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1390">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1390">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1391">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1391">numéro t.v.a</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1397">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1397">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1399">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1399">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1400">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1401">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1401">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1402">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1402">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1403">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1403">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1404">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1404">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1405">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1405">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1406">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1406">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1407">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1407">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1408">两个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1408">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1409">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1409">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1410">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1410">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1411">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1411">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1412">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1412">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1413">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1413">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1414">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1414">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1415">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1415">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1416">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1416">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1417">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1417">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1418">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1419">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1419">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1420">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1420">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1432">CNPJ (巴西法律实体) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1432">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1433">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1434">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1434">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1435">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1436">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1436">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1437">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1437">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1438">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1438">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1439">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1439">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1440">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1440">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1441">前八 (三个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1441">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1442">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1442">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1443">四位数分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1443">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1444">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1444">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1445">两个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1445">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1446">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1447">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1447">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1448">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1449">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1449">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1450">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1450">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1451">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1451">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1452">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1453">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1454">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1454">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1455">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1455">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1477">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1477">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1479">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1479">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1480">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1480">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1481">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1481">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1482">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1482">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1483">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1483">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1484">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1484">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1485">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1485">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1486">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1486">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1487">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1487">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1488">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1488">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1489">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1489">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1490">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1490">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1491">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1491">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1492">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1492">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1493">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1493">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1494">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1495">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1495">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1496">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1497">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1497">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1498">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1498">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1499">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1499">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1500">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1501">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1502">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1502">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1503">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1503">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1506">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1506">Cédula de identidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1508">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1508">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1509">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1509">número de rregistro</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1514">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1514">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1516">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1516">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1517">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1518">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1518">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1519">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1520">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1520">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1521">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1522">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1523">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1523">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1524">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1524">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1651">保加利亚统一编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1651">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1652">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1652">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1653">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1653">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1654">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1654">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1655">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1655">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1656">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1656">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1657">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1657">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1659">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1659">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1661">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1661">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1662">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1662">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1663">对应于出生日期的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1663">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1664">对应于性别的一个数字：一个偶数（男性）和一个奇数（对于男性）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1664">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1665">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1665">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1666">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1667">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1667">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1668">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1669">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1669">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1670">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1670">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1671">找到一个  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1671">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1672">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1673">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1673">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1718">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1718">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1719">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1720">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1720">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1721">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1722">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1722">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1723">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1724">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1724">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1725">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1726">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1727">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1727">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1728">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1728">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1729">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1729">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1730">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1731">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1731">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1732">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1732">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1752">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1752">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1753">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1753">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1754">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1754">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1755">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1755">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1756">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1756">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1757">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1757">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1758">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1758">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1759">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1759">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1760">三个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1760">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1761">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1761">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1762">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1762">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1763">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1764">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1764">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1765">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1766">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1767">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1767">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1768">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1768">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1769">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1769">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1770">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1770">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1771">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1771">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1772">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1772">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1796">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1796">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1798">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1798">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1799">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1800">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1800">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1801">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1802">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1802">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1803">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1804">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1804">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1805">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1805">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1806">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1806">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1807">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1807">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1808">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1808">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_province_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1809">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1809">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1810">省/市/自治区的缩写，例如 AB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1810">The province abbreviation, for example AB</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1811">省名称，例如 Alberta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1811">The province name, for example Alberta</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1812">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1812">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1813">DL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1813">DL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1814">DLS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1814">DLS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1815">CDL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1815">CDL</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1943">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1943">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1944">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1944">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1945">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1945">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1946">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1946">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1947">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1947">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1948">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1948">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1949">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1949">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1950">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1950">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1951">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1951">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1952">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1952">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1953">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1953">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1965">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1965">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1966">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1967">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1967">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1968">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1968">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1969">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1969">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1970">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1970">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1971">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1971">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-1972">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1972">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-1973">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1973">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1974">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1974">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-1975">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-1975">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2005">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2005">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2006">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2006">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2007">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2007">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2008">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2008">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2009">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2009">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2010">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2010">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2011">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2011">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2012">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2012">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2013">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2013">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2014">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2014">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2015">至少找到两个Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2015">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
