## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2048">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2048">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2049">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2050">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2050">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2051">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2051">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2052">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2052">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2053">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2053">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2054">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2054">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2055">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2055">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2056">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2056">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2057">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2057">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2058">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2058">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2059">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2060">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2060">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2061">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2062">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2063">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2063">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2064">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2064">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2065">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2065">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2066">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2066">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2067">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2067">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2068">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2068">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2069">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2070">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2070">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2071">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2071">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2072">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2072">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2097">智利身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2097">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2098">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2099">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2099">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2100">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2100">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2101">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2101">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2102">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2102">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2103">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2103">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2104">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2104">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2105">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2105">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2106">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2106">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2107">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2107">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2108">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2108">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2109">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2110">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2110">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2111">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2112">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2112">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2113">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2113">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2114">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2114">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2115">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2115">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2116">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2116">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2117">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2117">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2118">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2118">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2155">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2155">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2157">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2157">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2158">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2159">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2159">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2160">六个数字，即地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2160">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2161">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2161">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2162">三个数字，即订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2162">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2163">一个数字，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2163">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2164">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2165">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2165">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2166">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2167">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2167">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2168">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2168">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2169">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2169">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2170">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2171">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2171">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2172">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2172">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2173">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2173">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2176">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2176">Resident Identity Card</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2186">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2186">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2187">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2188">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2188">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2189">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2190">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2190">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2192">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2192">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2194">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2195">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2195">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2196">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2196">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2197">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2197">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2198">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2198">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2199">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2199">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2200">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2201">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2201">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2202">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2202">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2203">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2463">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2463">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2464">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2465">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2465">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2466">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2467">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2467">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2468">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2469">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2469">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2470">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2471">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2471">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2472">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2472">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2473">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2473">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2597">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2597">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2598">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2598">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2599">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2600">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2600">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2601">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2602">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2602">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2603">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2603">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2604">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2604">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2605">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2605">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2606">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2606">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2607">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2607">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2608">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2608">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2639">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2639">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2641">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2641">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2642">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2643">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2643">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2644">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2645">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2645">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2646">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2647">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2647">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2648">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2648">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2649">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2649">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2650">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2650">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2651">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2651">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2652">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2652">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2653">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2664">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2664">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2665">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2665">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2666">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2666">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2667">broj putov一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2667">broj putovnice</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2671">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2671">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2672">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2672">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2673">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2673">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2674">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2674">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2675">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2675">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2676">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2676">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2677">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2677">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2678">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2679">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2679">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2680">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2681">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2681">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2682">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2682">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2683">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2683">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2684">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2684">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2685">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2685">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2686">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2686">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2687">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2687">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2688">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2688">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2689">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2689">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2718">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2718">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2719">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2720">12 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2720">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2721">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2722">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2722">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2723">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2724">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2724">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2725">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2726">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2727">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2727">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2728">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2728">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2853">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2853">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2854">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2854">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2855">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2855">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2856">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2856">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2857">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2857">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2858">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2858">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2859">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2859">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2860">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2860">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2861">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2861">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2862">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2862">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2863">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2863">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2864">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2865">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2865">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2866">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2867">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2867">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2868">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2868">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2869">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2869">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2870">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2870">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2871">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2871">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2872">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2872">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2873">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2873">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2874">kim karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2874">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2875">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2875">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2876">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2876">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2877">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2877">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2878">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2878">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2879">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2879">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2880">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2880">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2881">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2881">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2882">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2882">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2883">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2884">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2884">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2885">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2886">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2886">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2887">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2887">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2888">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2888">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2889">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2889">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2890">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2890">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2891">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2891">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2892">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2892">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2921">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2921">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2922">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2922">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2923">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2923">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2924">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2924">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2925">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2925">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2926">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2926">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2927">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2927">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2928">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2929">指定模式中八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2929">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2930">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2931">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2931">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2932">a "0" or "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2932">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2933">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2933">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2934">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2934">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2935">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2935">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2936">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2936">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2937">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2937">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2938">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2938">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2939">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2939">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2940">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2940">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2941">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2941">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2942">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2942">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2970">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2970">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2972">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2972">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2974">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2974">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2975">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2975">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2976">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2976">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2977">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2977">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2978">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2978">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2979">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2980">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2980">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-2981">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-2982">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2983">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2983">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-2984">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-2984">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3110">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3110">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3111">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3112">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3112">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3113">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3114">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3114">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3115">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3116">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3116">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3117">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3118">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3119">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3119">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3120">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3120">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3121">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3121">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3122">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3122">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3123">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3123">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3124">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3146">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3146">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3148">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 十个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3148">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3150">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3150">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3151">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3151">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3152">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3152">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3153">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3153">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3154">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3154">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3155">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3155">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3156">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3156">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3157">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3157">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3158">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3159">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3159">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3160">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3161">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3161">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3162">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3162">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3163">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3163">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3164">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3164">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3165">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3165">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3166">函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3166">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3167">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3214">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3214">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3215">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3216">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3216">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3217">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3218">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3218">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3219">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3220">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3220">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3221">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3222">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3223">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3223">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3224">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3348">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3348">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3349">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3350">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3350">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3351">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3352">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3352">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3353">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3354">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3355">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3356">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3356">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3357">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3357">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3358">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3359">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` DD MM YY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3359">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3360">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3360">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3361">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3361">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3362">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3382">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3382">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3383">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3384">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3384">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3385">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3386">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3386">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3387">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3387">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3388">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3388">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3389">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3389">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3390">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3391">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3391">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3392">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3393">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3394">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3394">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3395">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3395">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3396">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3396">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3397">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3397">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3398">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3398">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3399">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3399">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3471">管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3471">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3472">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3473">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3473">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3474">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3475">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3475">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3476">一个字母 (可能) 字母集不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3476">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3477">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3477">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3478">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3478">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3480">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3480">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3482">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3482">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3483">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3483">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3484">找到一个 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3484">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3485">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3485">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3486">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3486">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3487">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3487">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3488">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3489">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3489">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3490">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3490">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3491">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3491">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3492">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3492">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3493">非法强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3493">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3494">管制局</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3494">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3495">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3495">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3496">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3497">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3497">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3498">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3499">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3499">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3500">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3500">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3501">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3501">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3502">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3503">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3504">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3505">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3506">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3506">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3507">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3507">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
