## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3633">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3633">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3634">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3634">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3635">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3635">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3636">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3636">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3637">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3637">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3638">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3638">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3639">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3639">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3641">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3641">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3642">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3643">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3643">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3644">一个数字，对应于性生活和百年 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3644">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3645">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3645">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3646">三个数字，对应于同一日期出生日期分隔的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3646">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3647">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3647">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3648">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3648">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3649">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3649">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3650">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3650">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3651">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3651">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3652">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3652">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3653">找到一个  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3653">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3654">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3654">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3655">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3655">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3688">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3688">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3689">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3690">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3690">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3691">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3692">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3692">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3693">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3694">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3694">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3695">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3696">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3697">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3697">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3698">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3698">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3699">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3699">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3700">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3701">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3701">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3702">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3720">欧盟借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3720">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3721">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3722">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3722">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3723">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3724">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3724">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3725">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3726">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-3727">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-3728">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3728">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3729">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3729">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3730">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3730">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3731">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3731">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3732">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3732">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3733">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3733">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3734">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3734">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3735">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3735">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-3736">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-3736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4182">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4182">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4184">包含连字符的十个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4184">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4186">包含连字符的十个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4186">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4187">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4187">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4188">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4188">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4189">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4189">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4190">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4190">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4192">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4192">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4194">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4194">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4195">正则表达式查找  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4195">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4196">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4196">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4327">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4327">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4328">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4328">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4329">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4329">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4330">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4330">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4331">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4331">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4332">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4332">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4333">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4333">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4334">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4335">20 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4335">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4336">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4337">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4337">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4338">十位数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4338">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4339">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4339">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4340">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4340">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4341">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4342">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4343">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4344">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4345">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4345">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4346">找到搜索Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4346">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4364">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4364">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4365">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4366">六个数字加上一个字符，指示一个世纪加三个数字加上一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4366">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4367">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4368">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4368">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4369">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4369">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4370">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4370">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4371">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4371">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4372">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4372">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4373">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4373">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4374">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4374">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4375">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4375">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4376">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4376">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4377">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4377">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4378">找到Keyword_finnish_national_id关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4378">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4379">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4379">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4380">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4380">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4381">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4381">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4382">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4382">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4431">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4431">Finland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4432">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4432">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4433">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4433">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4434">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4434">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4435">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4435">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4436">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4436">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4437">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4437">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4438">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4438">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4439">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4439">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4440">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4440">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4441">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4441">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4442">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4442">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4443">找到来自Keywords_eu_passport_number_common或Keyword_finland_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4443">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4464">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4464">France driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4465">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4466">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4466">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4467">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4468">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4468">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4469">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4470">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4470">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4471">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4472">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4473">函数Func_french_drivers_license找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4473">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4474">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4474">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4601">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4601">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4602">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4602">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4603">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4603">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4604">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4604">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4605">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4605">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4606">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4606">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4607">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4607">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4608">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4609">21 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4609">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4610">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4611">21 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4611">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4612">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4612">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4613">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4613">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4614">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4614">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4615">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4615">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4616">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4616">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4617">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4618">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4618">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4619">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4620">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4621">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4621">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4622">找到Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4622">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4623">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4623">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4624">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4624">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4625">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4625">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4626">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4626">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4627">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4627">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4628">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4628">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4629">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4629">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4630">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4630">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4631">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4631">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4632">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4632">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4633">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4633">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4634">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4634">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4635">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4635">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4636">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4636">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4637">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4637">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4638">找到搜索Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4638">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4639">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4639">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4640">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4640">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4643">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4643">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4644">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4644">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4645">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4645">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4646">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4646">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4647">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4647">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4648">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4648">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4649">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4649">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4650">numéro d'assurance mal访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4650">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4652">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4652">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4653">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4653">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4654">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4655">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4655">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4656">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4657">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4657">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4658">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4658">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4659">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4659">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4660">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4660">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4661">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4661">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4662">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4662">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4663">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4663">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4664">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4664">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4665">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4665">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4666">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4666">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4687">法国社会保险号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4687">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4688">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4688">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4689">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4690">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4690">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4691">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4692">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4692">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4693">13 个数字后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4693">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4694">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4694">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4695">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4695">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4696">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4697">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4698">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4699">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4699">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4700">该函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4700">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4701">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4701">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4702">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4703">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4703">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4704">该函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4704">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4705">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4705">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4706">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4706">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4732">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4732">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4733">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4733">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4734">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4734">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4735">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4735">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4736">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4736">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4737">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4737">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4738">1 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4738">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4739">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4739">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4740">2 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4740">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4741">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4741">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4742">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4742">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4743">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4743">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4744">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4744">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4745">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4745">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4746">3 个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4746">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4747">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4748">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4748">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4749">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4750">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4750">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4751">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4751">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4752">找到一个  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4752">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4753">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4753">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4754">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4754">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4755">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4755">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4756">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4756">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4757">numéro d'identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4757">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4760">税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4760">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4761">tax no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4761">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4762">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4762">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4763">税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4763">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4774">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4774">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4775">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4775">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4776">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4776">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4777">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4777">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4778">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4778">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4779">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4779">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4780">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4780">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4781">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4781">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4782">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4782">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4783">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4783">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4784">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4784">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4785">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4785">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4786">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4786">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4787">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4787">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4788">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4788">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4789">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4789">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4790">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4790">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4791">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4791">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4792">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4792">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4793">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4793">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4794">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4794">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4795">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4795">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4796">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4796">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4797">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4797">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4798">此函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4798">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4799">找到来自Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4799">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4800">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4800">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4801">此函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4801">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4814">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4814">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4815">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4815">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4816">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4816">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4817">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4817">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4818">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4818">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4819">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4819">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4820">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4820">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4821">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4821">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4822">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4822">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4823">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4823">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4824">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4825">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4825">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4826">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4827">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4827">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4828">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4828">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4829">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4829">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4830">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4830">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4979">德国身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4979">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4980">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4981">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4981">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4982">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4982">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4983">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4984">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4984">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4985">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4985">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4986">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4986">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4987">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4987">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4988">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4988">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4989">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4989">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4990">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4990">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4991">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4991">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-4992">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4992">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4993">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4993">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4994">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4994">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4995">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4995">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-4996">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4996">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4997">aus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4997">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4998">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4998">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-4999">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-4999">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5000">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5000">identifikation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5002">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5002">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5003">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5003">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5004">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5004">id-nummer</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5010">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5010">Germany passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5011">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5012">十个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5012">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5013">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5014">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5014">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5015">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5015">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5016">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5016">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5017">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5017">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5018">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5018">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5019">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5020">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5020">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5021">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5022">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5022">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5023">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5023">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5024">找到或 `Keyword_german_passport` 找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5024">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5025">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5025">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5026">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5027">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5027">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5028">找到或 `Keyword_german_passport` 找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5028">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5029">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5052">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5052">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5054">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5054">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5055">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5056">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5056">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5057">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5057">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5058">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5058">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5059">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5059">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5060">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5060">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5061">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5061">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5062">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5062">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5063">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5063">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5064">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5064">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5065">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5066">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5066">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5067">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5068">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5068">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5069">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5069">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5070">找到一个  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5070">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5071">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5072">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5072">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5098">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5098">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5099">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5099">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5100">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5100">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5101">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5101">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5102">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5102">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5103">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5103">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5104">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5104">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5105">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5106">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5106">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5107">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5108">11 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5108">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5109">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5109">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5110">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5110">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5111">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5111">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5112">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5112">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5113">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5113">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5114">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5114">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5115">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5115">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5116">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5116">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5117">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5117">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5118">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5118">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5119">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5119">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5120">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5120">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5121">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5121">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5122">找到搜索Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5122">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5123">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5123">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5124">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5124">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5134">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5134">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5135">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5136">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5136">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5137">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5138">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5138">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5139">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5140">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5141">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5142">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5143">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5144">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
