## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5270">希腊国家身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5270">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5271">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5272">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5272">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5273">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5274">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5274">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5275">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5275">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5276">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5276">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5277">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5277">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5278">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5278">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5279">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5279">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5280">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5280">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5281">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5281">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5282">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5283">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5284">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5285">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5285">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5286">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5286">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5287">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5287">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5288">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5288">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5289">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5289">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5290">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5290">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5291">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5291">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5292">希腊语 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5292">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5293">希腊语国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5293">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5294">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5294">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5295">希腊语的警察局 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5295">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5296">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5296">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5297">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5297">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5298">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5298">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5299">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5299">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5300">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5300">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5301">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5302">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5302">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5303">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5304">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5304">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5305">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5306">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5306">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5307">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5308">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5308">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5309">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5309">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5310">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5311">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 或找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5311">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5312">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5313">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5313">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5314">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5314">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5316">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5316">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5317">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5317">passport#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5319">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5319">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5320">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5320">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5323">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5323">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5324">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5324">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5325">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5325">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5326">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5326">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5327">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5327">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5328">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5328">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5329">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5329">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5330">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5330">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5331">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5331">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5332">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5333">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5334">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5335">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5336">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5337">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5338">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5339">无空格和分隔符的十一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5339">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5340">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5340">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5341">6 个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5341">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5342">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5342">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5343">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5343">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5344">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5344">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5345">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5345">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5346">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5346">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5347">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5347">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5348">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5348">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5349">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5349">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5350">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5350">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5351">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5351">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5352">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5352">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5353">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5353">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5354">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5354">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5355">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5355">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5356">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5356">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5357">socialsecurityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5357">socialsecurityno#</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5362">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5362">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5363">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5364">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5365">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5366">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5367">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5368">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5370">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5370">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5371">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5372">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5372">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5373">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5373">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5374">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5374">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5375">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5375">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5376">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5376">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5377">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5377">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5378">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5378">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5407">香港身份证号码 (HKID) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5407">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5409">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5409">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5410">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5411">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5411">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5412">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5412">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5413">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5413">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5414">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5414">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5416">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5418">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5419">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5419">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5420">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5420">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5421">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5421">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5422">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5422">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5423">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5423">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5424">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5424">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5464">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5464">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5465">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5466">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5466">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5467">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5468">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5468">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5469">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5469">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5470">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5470">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5471">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5472">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5473">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5474">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5475">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5476">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5601">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5601">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5602">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5602">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5603">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5603">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5604">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5604">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5605">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5605">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5606">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5606">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5607">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5607">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5608">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5608">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5609">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5609">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5610">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5610">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5611">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5611">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5612">对于在 1900 之前 (或具有双重公民身份的公民，也可以对应性别（1-男性、2-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5612">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5613">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5613">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5614">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5614">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5615">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5615">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5616">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5617">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5617">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5618">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5619">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5619">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5620">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5620">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5621">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5621">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5622">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5622">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5623">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5623">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5624">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5624">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5625">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5625">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5626">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5626">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5627">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5627">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5628">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5628">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5629">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5629">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5630">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5630">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5631">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5631">sz.ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5633">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5633">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5634">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5634">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5635">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5636">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5636">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5637">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5638">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5638">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5639">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5639">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5640">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5640">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5641">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5641">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5642">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5642">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5643">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5643">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5644">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5644">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5645">正则表达式查找 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (格式的日期 示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5645">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5646">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5646">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5647">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5647">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5648">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5648">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5665">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5665">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5666">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5666">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5667">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5667">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5668">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5668">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5669">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5669">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5670">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5671">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5671">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5672">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5673">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5674">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5674">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5675">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5675">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5676">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5676">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5677">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5677">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5686">taj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5686">taj</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5693">általcioos forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5693">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5694">hozzáadottottottték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5694">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5695">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5695">áfa szám</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5697">匈牙利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5697">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5698">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5698">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5699">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5699">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5700">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5700">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5701">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5701">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5702">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5702">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5703">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5703">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5705">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5705">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5706">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5707">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5707">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5708">一个数字，必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5708">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5709">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5709">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5710">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5710">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5711">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5712">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5712">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5713">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5714">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5715">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5715">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5716">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5716">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5717">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5718">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5718">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5744">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5744">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5745">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5745">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5746">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5746">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5747">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5747">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5748">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5748">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5749">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5749">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5750">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5750">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5752">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5752">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5753">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5754">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5754">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5755">2 个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5755">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5756">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5756">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5757">8 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5757">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5758">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5759">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5759">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5760">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5761">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5762">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5762">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5763">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5763">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5764">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5765">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5765">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5771">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5771">vatno#</span></span>
