- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5777">hozzáadottottottték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5777">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5778">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5778">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5779">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5779">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5781">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5781">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5783">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5783">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5784">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5784">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5785">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5785">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5786">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5786">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5787">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5787">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5788">字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5788">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5790">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5790">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5793">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5793">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5794">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5794">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5795">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5796">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5796">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5797">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5797">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5798">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5798">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5799">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5799">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5800">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5800">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5801">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5801">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5802">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5803">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5803">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5804">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5805">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5805">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5806">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5806">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5807">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5807">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5808">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5808">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5809">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5809">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5810">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5810">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5811">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5811">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5812">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5813">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5813">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5814">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5815">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5815">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5816">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5816">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5817">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5817">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5818">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5818">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5819">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5819">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5820">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5820">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5821">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5822">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5822">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5823">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5823">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5824">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5824">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5825">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5825">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5826">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5826">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5827">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5827">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5828">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5828">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5829">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5829">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5830">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5830">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5831">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5832">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5832">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5833">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5834">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5834">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5835">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5835">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5836">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5836">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5837">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5837">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5838">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5838">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5839">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5839">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5840">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5840">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5841">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5841">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5842">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5842">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5843">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5844">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5845">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5846">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5846">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5847">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5847">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5848">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5848">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5849">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5849">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5850">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5850">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5851">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5851">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5852">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5852">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5853">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5853">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5854">IBAN 服务 (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5854">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5855">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5856">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5856">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5857">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5858">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5858">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5859">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5859">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5860">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5860">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5861">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5861">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5862">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5862">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-p133">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5865">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5865">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5867">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5869">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5870">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5870">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5871">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5871">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5872">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5872">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5873">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5873">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5874">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5874">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5875">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5876">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5876">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5877">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5878">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5878">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5879">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5880">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5881">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5882">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5882">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5883">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5883">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5884">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5884">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5885">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5886">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5886">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5887">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5887">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5888">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5888">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5889">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5889">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5890">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5890">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5891">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5891">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5892">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5892">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5893">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5893">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5894">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5894">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5895">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5895">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5896">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5896">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5897">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5898">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5898">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5899">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5900">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5900">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5901">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5901">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5902">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5902">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5903">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5903">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5904">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5904">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5905">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5905">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5906">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5906">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5907">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5907">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5908">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际分类（第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)) ）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5908">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5909">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5909">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5910">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5910">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5911">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5912">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5912">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5913">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5913">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5914">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5914">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5915"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5915">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5916">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5916">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5917">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5918">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5919">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5920">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5920">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5921">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5921">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5922">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5922">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5923">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5923">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5924">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5924">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5925">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5925">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5926">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5926">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5927">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5927">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5928">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5928">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5929">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5929">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5930">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5930">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5931">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5931">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5932">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5932">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5933">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5933">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5934">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5934">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5935">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5935">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5936">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5936">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5937">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5938">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5938">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5939">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5939">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5940">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5940">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5941">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5941">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5942">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5942">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5943">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5944">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5944">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-5945">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-5946">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5947">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5947">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-5948">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-5948">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6072">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6072">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6073">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6074">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6074">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6075">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6076">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6076">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6077">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6077">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6078">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6078">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6079">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6079">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6080">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6080">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6081">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6081">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6082">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6082">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6083">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6083">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6084">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6084">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6085">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6085">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6086">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6086">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6087">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6087">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6088">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6088">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6112">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6112">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6114">旧格式 (2012 年 12 月 31 日) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6114">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6115">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6115">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6116">新格式 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6116">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6117">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6117">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6118">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6119">旧格式 (2012 年 12 月 31 日) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6119">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6120">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6120">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6121">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6121">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6122">新格式 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6122">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6123">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6123">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6124">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6124">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6125">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6125">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6126">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6127">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6127">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6128">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6129">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6129">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6130">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6130">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6131">找到搜索Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6131">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6132">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6132">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6133">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6133">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6134">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6134">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6135">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6135">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6180">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6180">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6181">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6182">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6182">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6183">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6184">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6184">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6185">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6185">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6186">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6186">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6187">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6187">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6188">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6188">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6189">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6189">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6190">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6190">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6191">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6191">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6192">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6193">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6193">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6194">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6195">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6196">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6196">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6197">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6197">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6198">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6198">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6199">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6199">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6200">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6200">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6201">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6201">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6202">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6202">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6203">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6203">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6204">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6204">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6205">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6206">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6206">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6207">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6208">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6208">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6209">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6209">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6210">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6210">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6211">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6211">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6212">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6213">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6213">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6214">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6214">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6215">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6221">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6221">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6222">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6222">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6223">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6223">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6224">رقم الهوية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6224">رقم الهوية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6225">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6225">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6227">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6227">id number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6228">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6228">identity no</span></span>        
-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6229">identitynumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6229">identitynumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6230">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6230">identity number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6231">identitynumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6231">israeliidentitynumber</span></span>       
-   <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6232">个人 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6232">personal id</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6234">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6234">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6235">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6236">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6236">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6237">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6238">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6238">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6239">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6239">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6240">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6240">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6241">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6241">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6242">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6242">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6243">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6244">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6244">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6245">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6246">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6247">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6247">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6248">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6248">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6249">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6249">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6250">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6250">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6251">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6251">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6252">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6252">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6253">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6253">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6254">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6254">patenti di guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6256">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6256">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6257">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6257">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6258">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6258">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6259">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6259">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6260">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6260">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6261">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6261">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6262">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6262">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6263">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6264">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6264">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6265">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6266">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6266">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6267">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6267">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6268">三个字母，分别对应于名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6268">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6269">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6269">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6270">一个字母，对应于出生日期月份中的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，一月是 A，十月是 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6270">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6271">与出生日期对应的两位数 -为了区分性别，将 40 添加到性别的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6271">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6272">四个数字，对应于某人所 (的国家/地区代码所特有的地区代码，用于) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6272">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6273">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6273">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6274">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6275">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6276">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6277">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6277">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6278">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6278">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6279">找到一个  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6279">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6280">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6280">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6281">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6281">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6316">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6316">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6317">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6318">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6318">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6319">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6320">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6320">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6321">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6321">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6322">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6322">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6323">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6324">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6324">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6325">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6326">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6327">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6327">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6328">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6328">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6329">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6329">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6330">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6330">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6331">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6331">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6332">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6333">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6333">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6334">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6334">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6335">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6335">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6356">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6356">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6357">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6357">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6358">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6358">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6359">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6359">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6360">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6360">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6361">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6361">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6362">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6362">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6363">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6363">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6364">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6364">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6365">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6365">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6366">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6366">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6367">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6367">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6368">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6368">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6369">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6369">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6370">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6370">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6371">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6372">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6372">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6373">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6374">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6375">该函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6375">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6376">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6376">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6377">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6377">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6378">该函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6378">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6386">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6386">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6388">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6388">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6390">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6390">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6391">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6391">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6392">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6392">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6393">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6393">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6394">可选 (或短) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6394">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6395">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6395">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6396">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6397">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6397">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6398">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6399">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6400">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6400">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6401">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6401">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6402">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6402">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6403">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6403">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6404">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6404">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6405">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6406">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6406">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6407">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6407">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6454">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6454">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6456">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6456">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6458">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6458">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6459">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6460">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6460">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6461">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6462">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6463">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6463">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6464">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6464">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
