## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6502">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6502">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6503">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6503">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6504">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6504">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6505">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6505">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6506">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6506">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6507">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6507">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6508">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6508">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6509">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6509">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6510">13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6510">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6511">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6511">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6512">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6512">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6513">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6513">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6514">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6514">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6515">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6516">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6517">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6518">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6519">该函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6519">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6520">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6520">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6521">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6521">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6522">该函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6522">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6523">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6523">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6524">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6524">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6525">公司号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6525">corporate number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6527">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6527">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6528">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6528">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6529">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6529">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6530">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6530">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6531">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6531">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6532">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6532">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6533">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6533">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6534">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6534">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6535">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6535">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6536">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6536">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6537">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6537">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6538">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6538">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6539">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6539">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6540">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6540">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6541">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6541">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6542">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6543">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6543">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6544">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6545">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6545">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6546">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6546">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6547">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6547">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6548">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6548">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6549">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6549">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6550">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6550">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6551">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6552">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6553">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6554">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6555">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6555">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6556">找到搜索Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6556">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6557">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6557">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6558">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6558">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6559">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6559">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6560">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6560">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6571">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6571">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6572">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6572">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6573">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6573">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6574">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6574">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6575">两个字母 (区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6575">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6576">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6576">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6577">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6577">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6578">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6578">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6579">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6579">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6580">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6580">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6581">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6581">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6586">Passport No。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6586">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6587">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6587">Passport #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6591">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6591">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6592">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6592">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6593">パスポNo。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6593">パスポートNo.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6598">日本居民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6598">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6599">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6600">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6600">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6601">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6602">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6602">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6603">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6603">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6604">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6604">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6605">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6605">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6606">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6607">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6608">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6609">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6609">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6610">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6610">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6611">找到搜索Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6611">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6613">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6613">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6614">住宅卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6614">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6615">住宅卡否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6615">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6616">居住地卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6616">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6617">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6617">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6618">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6618">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6619">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6619">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6620">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6620">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6621">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6622">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6622">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6623">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6624">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6624">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6625">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6625">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6626">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6626">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6627">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6627">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6628">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6628">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6629">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6629">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6630">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6630">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6631">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6631">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6632">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6632">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6633">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6633">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6634">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6634">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6635">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6635">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6636">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6636">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6637">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6637">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6638">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6638">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6639">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6639">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6640">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6640">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6641">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6641">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6642">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6642">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6643">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6643">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6645">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6645">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6647">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6647">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6648">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6648">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6649">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6649">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6650">六个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6650">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6651">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6651">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6652">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6653">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6653">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6654">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6655">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6655">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6656">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6656">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6657">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6657">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6658">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6659">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6659">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6660">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6660">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6661">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6661">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6662">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6662">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6663">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6663">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6664">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6664">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6665">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6665">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6666">健康保険被保険者番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6666">健康保険被保険者番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6667">健保番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6667">健保番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6668">基礎年金番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6668">基礎年金番号</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6681">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6681">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6683">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6683">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6684">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6685">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6685">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6686">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6686">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6687">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6687">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6688">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6689">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6689">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6690">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6691">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6692">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6692">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6693">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6693">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6818">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6818">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6820">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6820">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6821">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6822">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6822">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6823">11 个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6823">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6824">对应于 DD.2016 (日期的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6824">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6825">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6825">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6826">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"，"1"表示 20 世纪，"2"对应于 21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6826">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6827">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6827">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6828">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6828">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6829">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6829">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6830">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6830">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6831">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6831">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6832">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6833">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6833">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6834">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6835">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6835">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6836">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6836">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6837">找到一个  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6837">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6838">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6838">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6839">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6839">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6902">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6902">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6903">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6904">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6904">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6905">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6906">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6906">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6907">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6907">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6908">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6908">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6909">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6910">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6911">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6912">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6912">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6913">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6913">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6914">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6915">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6915">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6916">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6916">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6917">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6917">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6918">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6918">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6941">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6941">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6942">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6942">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6943">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6943">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6944">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6944">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6945">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6945">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6946">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6946">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6947">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6947">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-6948">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6948">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-6949">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6949">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6950">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6950">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-6951">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-6951">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7076">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7076">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7077">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7077">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7078">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7078">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7079">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7079">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7080">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7080">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7081">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7081">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7082">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7082">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7083">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7083">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7084">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7084">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7085">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7085">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7086">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7086">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7087">1 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7087">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7088">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7088">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7089">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7089">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7090">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7090">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7091">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7091">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7092">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7092">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7093">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7093">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7094">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7094">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7095">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7095">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7096">找到一个  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7096">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7097">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7098">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7098">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7133">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7133">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7134">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7135">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7135">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7136">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7136">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7137">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7137">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7138">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7139">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7139">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7140">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7141">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7142">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7142">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7143">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7143">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7144">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7144">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7145">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7145">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7146">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7146">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7147">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7147">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7167">都明网驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7167">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7168">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7169">不带空格和分隔符的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7169">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7170">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7171">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7171">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7173">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7176">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7176">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7177">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7301"> () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7301">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7302">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7302">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7303">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7303">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7304">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7304">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7305">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7305">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7306">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7306">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7307">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7307">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7308">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7309">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7309">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7310">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7311">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7311">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7312">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7312">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7313">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7313">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7314">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7315">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7315">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7316">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7317">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7317">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7318">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7318">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7319">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7319">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7320">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7320">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7321">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7321">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7344">都鲁比卡护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7344">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7345">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7345">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7346">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7346">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7347">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7347">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7348">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7348">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7349">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7350">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7350">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7351">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7352">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7352">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7353">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7353">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7354">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7354">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7355">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7355">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7356">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7357">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7358">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7390"> (非自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7390">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7391">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7391">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7392">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7392">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7393">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7393">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7394">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7394">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7395">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7395">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7396">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7396">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7397">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7397">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7398">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7398">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7399">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7399">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7400">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7400">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7401">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7401">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7402">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7402">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7403">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7404">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7404">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7405">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7406">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7406">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7407">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7407">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7408">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7408">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7409">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7410">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7410">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7450">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7450">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7451">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7452">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7452">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7453">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7454">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7454">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7455">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7455">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7456">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7456">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7457">双字母的出生日期代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7457">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7458">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7458">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7459">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7459">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7460">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7460">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7461">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7462">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7462">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7463">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7464">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7464">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7465">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7465">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7466">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7466">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7493">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7493">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7494">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7495">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7495">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7496">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7497">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7497">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7498">两个字符 (或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7498">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7499">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7499">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7500">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7500">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7501">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7501">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7502">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7502">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7503">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7504">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7504">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7505">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7506">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7506">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7507">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7507">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7508">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7508">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7633">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7633">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7634">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7634">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7635">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7635">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7636">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7636">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7637">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7637">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7638">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7638">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7639">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7640">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7640">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7641">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7642">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7642">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7643">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7643">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7644">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7644">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7645">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7646">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7646">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7647">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7648">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7648">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7649">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7649">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7650">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7650">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7651">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7651">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7652">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7652">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7657">identifjet numru tal-jetjett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7657">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7658">kodiċi数字个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7658">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7659">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7659">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7660">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7660">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7661">numru ta 'identifkuzzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7661">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7662">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7662">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7663">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7663">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7664">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7664">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7665">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7665">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7666">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7666">unique identification number</span></span>
