- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7668">uniqueidentityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7668">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7669">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7669">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7670">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7671">不带空格或分隔符的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7671">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7672">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7673">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7673">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7674">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7675">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7675">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7676">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7677">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7678">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7678">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7679">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7679">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7680">找到一个 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7680">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7681">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7681">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7682">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7682">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7683">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7683">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7697">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7697">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7703">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7703">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7705">对于马耳他语的公民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7705">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7706">指定模式中七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7706">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7707">非马耳他语国家/省和马耳他实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7707">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7708">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7708">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7709">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7710">马耳他语：七位数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7710">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7711">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7711">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7712">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7712">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7713">非马耳他语公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7713">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7714">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7714">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7715">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7716">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7716">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7717">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7718">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7719">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7719">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7720">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7720">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7721">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7721">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7722">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7722">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7723">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7723">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7724">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7724">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7725">citizen service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7725">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7726">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7726">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7727">identifjet numru tal-jetjett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7727">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7728">kodiċi数字个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7728">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7755">荷兰公民的服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7755">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7757">包含可选空格的八九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7757">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7759">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7759">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7760">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7760">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7761">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7761">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7762">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7762">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7763">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7763">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7764">两位三位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7764">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7765">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7766">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7766">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7767">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7768">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7768">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7769">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7769">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7770">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7770">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7771">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7771">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7795">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7795">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7796">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7797">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7797">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7798">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7798">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7799">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7799">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7801">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7804">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7804">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7805">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7933">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7933">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7934">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7935">无空格或分隔符的九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7935">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7936">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7937">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7937">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7938">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7939">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7939">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7940">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7941">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7941">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7942">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7942">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7943">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7944">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7944">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7945">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7945">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7946">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7946">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7947">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7965">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7965">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7966">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7966">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7967">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7967">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7968">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7968">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7969">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7969">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7970">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7970">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7971">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7971">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7972">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7973">不带空格或分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7973">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7974">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7975">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7975">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7976">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7977">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-7978">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7979">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7980">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7980">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7981">找到一个  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7981">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-7982">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7982">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-7983">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-7983">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8021">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8021">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8022">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8022">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8023">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8023">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8024">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8024">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8025">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8025">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8026">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8026">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8027">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8027">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8028">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8028">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8029">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8029">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8030">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8030">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8031">14 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8031">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8032">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8032">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8033">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8033">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8034">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8034">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8035">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8035">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8036">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8036">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8037">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8037">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8038">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8038">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8039">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8039">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8040">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8040">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8041">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8041">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8042">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8042">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8043">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8043">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8044">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8044">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8045">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8046">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8046">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8047">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8047">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8048">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8048">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8055">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8055">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8056">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8056">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8057">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8057">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8058">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8058">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8059">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8059">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8060">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8060">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8061">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8061">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8062">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8063">带可选分隔符的 14 到 16 个数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8063">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8064">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8065">带可选分隔符的 14 到 16 个数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8065">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8066">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8066">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8067">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8067">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8068">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8068">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8069">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8069">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8070">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8070">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8071">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8071">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8072">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8072">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8073">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8073">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8074">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8075">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8076">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8077">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8077">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8078">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8078">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8079">找到搜索Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8079">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8080">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8080">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8081">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8081">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8082">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8082">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8089">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8089">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8090">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8090">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8091">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8091">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8092">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8092">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8093">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8093">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8094">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8094">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8095">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8095">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8096">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8096">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8097">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8097">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8098">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8098">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8099">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8099">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8100">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8100">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8101">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8101">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8102">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8103">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8103">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8104">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8105">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8105">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8106">该函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8106">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8107">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8107">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8108">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8108">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8109">该函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8109">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8176">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8176">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8177">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8177">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8178">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8178">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8179">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8179">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8180">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8180">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8181">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8181">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8182">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8182">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8184">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8184">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8186">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8186">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8187">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8187">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8188">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8188">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8189">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8189">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8190">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8190">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8191">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8191">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8192">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8193">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8193">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8194">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8196">该函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8196">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8197">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8197">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8199">该函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8199">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8200">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8200">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8201">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8201">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8202">否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8202">ird no.</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8208">新西兰医疗局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8208">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8209">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8210">三个字母，一 (可选) 和四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8210">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8211">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8211">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8212">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8212">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8213">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8213">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8214">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8214">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8215">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8216">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8216">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8217">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8218">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8218">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8219">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8219">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8220">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8220">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8221">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8221">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8222">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8223">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8223">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8224">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8224">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8225">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8225">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8229">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8229">Health</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8230">处理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8230">treatment</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8234">NHI#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8234">NHI#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8235">National Health Index No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8235">National Health Index No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8236">National Health Index Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8236">National Health Index Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8237">国家健康索引#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8237">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8238">新西兰社会电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8238">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8239">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8240">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8241">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8241">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8242">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8243">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8244">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8245">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8246">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8246">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8247">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8248">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8248">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8249">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8249">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8250">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8250">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8251">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8251">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8252">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8252">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8253">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8253">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8254">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8254">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8255">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8255">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8256">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8256">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8257">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8257">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8258">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8258">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8259">找到搜索Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8259">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8260">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8260">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8261">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8261">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8269">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8269">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8270">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8271">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8271">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8272">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8273">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8273">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8274">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8274">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8275">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8275">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8276">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8276">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8277">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8277">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8278">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8278">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8279">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8279">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8280">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8280">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8281">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8281">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8282">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8282">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8283">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8283">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8284">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8285">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8285">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8286">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8286">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8287">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8287">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8288">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8289">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8289">Personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8291">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8291">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8292">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8292">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8293">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8293">Personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8295">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8295">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8296">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8297">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8297">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8298">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8299">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8299">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8300">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8300">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8301">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8301">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8302">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8302">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8303">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8303">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8304">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8304">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8305">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8305">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8306">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8306">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8307">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8307">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8308">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8308">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8309">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8309">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8310">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8310">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8317">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8317">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8318">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8319">14 个数字，包含 2 个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8319">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8320">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8321">14 个数字和 2 个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8321">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8322">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8322">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8323">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8323">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8324">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8324">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8325">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8325">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8326">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8326">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8327">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8327">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8328">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8328">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8329">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8329">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8330">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8330">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8331">正则表达式查找  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8331">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8332">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8456">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8456">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8457">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8457">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8458">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8458">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8459">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8459">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8460">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8460">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8461">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8462">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8463">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8464">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8464">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8465">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8465">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8466">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8466">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8467">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8467">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8468">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8468">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8469">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8469">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8470">博拉维多 osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8470">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8471">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8471">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8472">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8472">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8473">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8473">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8474">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8474">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8475">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8475">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8476">。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8476">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8477">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8477">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8478">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8478">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8479">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8479">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8480">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8480">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8481">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8481">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8482">6 个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8482">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8483">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8483">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8484">1 个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8484">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8485">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8486">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8486">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8487">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8488">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8488">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8489">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8489">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8490">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8490">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8491">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8491">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8492">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8492">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8493">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8493">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8494">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8494">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8495">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8495">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8496">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8496">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8497">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8497">dowód osobisty</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8500">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8500">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8501">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8501">nr.-pesel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8503">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8503">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8504">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8504">pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8506">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8506">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8507">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8507">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8508">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8509">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8509">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8510">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8511">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8511">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8512">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8513">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8513">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8514">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8515">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8515">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8516">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8516">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8517">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8517">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8518">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8518">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8519">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8519">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8520">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8520">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8521">Numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8521">Numer paszportu</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8524">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8524">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8525">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8525">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8526">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8526">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8527">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8527">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8528">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8528">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8529">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8529">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8530">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8530">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8531">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8531">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8532">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8533">九位数或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8533">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8534">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8535">九位数字或 14 位号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8535">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8536">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8536">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8537">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8537">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8538">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8538">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8539">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8539">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8540">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8541">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8541">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8542">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8543">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8543">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8544">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8544">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8545">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8545">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8546">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8546">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8547">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8547">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
