## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8564">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8564">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8565">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8565">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8566">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8566">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8567">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8567">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8568">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8568">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8569">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8569">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8570">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8570">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8571">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8572">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8572">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8573">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8574">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8574">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8575">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8575">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8576">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8576">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8577">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8577">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8578">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8578">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8579">该  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8579">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8580">找到一个  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8580">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8610">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8610">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8611">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8612">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8612">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8613">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8614">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8614">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8615">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8616">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8616">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8617">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8618">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8618">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8619">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8619">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8620">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8620">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8640">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8640">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8641">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8642">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8642">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8643">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8644">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8644">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8645">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8645">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8646">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8646">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8647">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8647">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8648">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8648">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8649">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8649">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8650">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字，带特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8650">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8651">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8651">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8652">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8652">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8653">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8653">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8654">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8654">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8655">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8655">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8656">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8657">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8658">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8659">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8660">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8660">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8661">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8662">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8662">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8793">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8793">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8794">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8795">一个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8795">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8797">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8797">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8798">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8798">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8799">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8799">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8801">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8803">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8804">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8804">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8805">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8806">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8806">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8807">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8808">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8808">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8809">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8809">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8836">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8836">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8838">包含可选空格的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8838">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8839">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8840">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8840">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8841">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8841">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8842">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8842">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8843">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8843">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8844">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8844">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8845">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8846">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8846">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8847">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8848">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8849">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8849">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8850">找到一个  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8850">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8851">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8851">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8852">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8852">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8877">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8877">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8878">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8879">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8879">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8880">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8881">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8881">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8882">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8882">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8883">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8883">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8884">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8885">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-8886">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-8887">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8887">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8888">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8888">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-8889">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9017">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9017">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9018">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9018">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9019">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9019">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9020">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9020">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9021">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9021">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9022">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9022">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9023">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9023">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9024">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9025">13 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9025">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9026">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9026">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9027">1 位到 9 位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9027">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9028">表示 YYMMDD (出生日期的 6 个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9028">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9029">2 个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9029">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9030">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9030">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9031">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9032">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9033">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9034">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9034">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9035">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9035">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9036">找到一个  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9036">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9037">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9037">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9038">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9038">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9089">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9089">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9090">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9091">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9091">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9092">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9093">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9093">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9094">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9094">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9095">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9095">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9096">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9096">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9097">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9097">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9098">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9098">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9099">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9099">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9100">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例- 01 二月/二月 10) 或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9100">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9101">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9101">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9102">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9102">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9103">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9103">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9121">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9121">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9122">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9122">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9123">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9123">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9124">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9124">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9125">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9125">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9126">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9126">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9127">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9127">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9128">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9129">十位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9129">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9130">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9131">十位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9131">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9132">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9132">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9133">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9133">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9134">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9134">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9135">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9135">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9136">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9136">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9137">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9138">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9139">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9140">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9140">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9141">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9141">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9142">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9142">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9159">俄罗斯护照号码国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9159">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9160">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9161">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9162">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9163">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9164">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9165">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9167">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9167">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9168">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9169">九位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9169">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9170">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9170">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9171">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9171">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9172">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9172">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9173">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9173">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9174">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9174">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9175">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9175">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9176">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9176">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9177">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9177">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9178">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9178">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9195">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9195">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9196">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9197">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9197">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9198">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9199">十个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9199">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9200">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9201">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9201">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9202">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9203">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9203">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9204">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9204">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9205">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9205">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9207">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9207">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9210">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9210">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9211">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9211">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9212">新加坡国家/ (身份证号码) NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9212">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9213">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9214">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9214">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9215">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9215">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9216">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9216">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9217">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9217">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9218">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9218">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9219">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9219">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9220">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9221">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9221">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9222">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9223">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9223">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9224">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9224">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9225">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9225">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9226">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9226">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9227">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9228">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9228">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9229">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9229">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9231">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9231">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9240">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9240">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9242">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9242">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9243">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9244">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9244">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9245">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9245">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9246">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9246">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9248">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9250">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9251">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9251">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9252">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9253">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9253">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9254">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9254">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9255">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9255">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9256">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9256">driverlics</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9378">斯洛伐克个人编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9378">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9379">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9379">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9380">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9380">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9381">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9381">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9382">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9382">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9383">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9383">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9384">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9384">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9385">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9385">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9386">包含可选反反杠的九个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9386">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9387">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9387">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9388">6 个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9388">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9389">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9389">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9390">3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9390">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9391">1 个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9391">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9392">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9393">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9393">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9394">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9395">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9395">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9396">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9396">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9397">找到一个  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9397">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9398">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9398">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9399">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9399">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9446">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9446">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9448">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9448">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9450">一个数字或字母 (区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9450">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9451">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9452">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9453">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9454">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9455">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9455">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9456">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9456">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9457">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9457">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9458">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9458">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9459">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9459">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9460">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9460">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9482">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9482">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9484">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9484">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9485">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9486">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9486">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9487">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9488">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9488">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9489">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9490">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9491">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9491">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9492">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9492">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9493">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9493">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9494">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9494">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9495">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9495">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9496">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9496">driverlics</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9619">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9619">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9620">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9620">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9621">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9621">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9622">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9622">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9623">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9623">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9624">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9624">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9625">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9625">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9626">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9627">13 个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9627">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9628">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9629">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9629">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9630">对应于 DDMMLLL (的七个数字) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9630">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9631">对应于出生日期"50"的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9631">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9632">三个数字，对应于同一天（男性为 (000-499）和 500-999（对于男性）的性别和序列号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9632">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9633">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9633">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9634">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9634">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9635">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9635">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9636">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9636">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9637">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9637">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9638">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9638">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9639">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9639">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9640">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9640">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9641">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9641">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9669">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9669">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9670">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9671">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9671">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9672">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9673">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9673">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9674">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9674">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9675">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9675">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9676">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9676">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9677">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9678">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9678">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9679">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9680">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9681">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9681">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9682">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9682">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9683">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9683">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9684">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9684">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9685">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9685">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9686">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9686">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9699">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9699">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9700">以tevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9700">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9709">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9709">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9710">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9710">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9711">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9711">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9712">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9712">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9713">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9713">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9714">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9714">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9715">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9715">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9716">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9717">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9717">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9718">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9718">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9719">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9719">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9720">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9720">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9721">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9721">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9722">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9723">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9723">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9724">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9725">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9725">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9726">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9726">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9727">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9727">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9728">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9728">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9729">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9729">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9730">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9730">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9753">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9753">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9755">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9755">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9756">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9757">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9757">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9758">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9758">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9759">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9759">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9760">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9760">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9761">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9761">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9762">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9762">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9763">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9764">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9765">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9766">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9767">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9767">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9768">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9768">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9769">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9770">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9770">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9771">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9771">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>
