## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9775">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9775">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9776">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9777">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9777">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9778">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9779">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9779">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9780">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9780">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9781">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9781">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9782">由世纪和性别确定的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9782">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9783">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9783">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9784">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9784">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9785">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9785">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9786">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9787">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9787">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9788">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9789">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9789">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9790">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9790">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9791">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9791">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9792">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9793">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9794">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9794">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9795">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9796">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9796">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9797">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9797">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9800">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9800">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9801">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9801">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9803">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9803">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9805">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9805">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9806">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9807">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9807">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9808">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9808">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9809">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9809">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9811">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9811">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9814">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9814">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9815">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9815">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9816">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9817">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9817">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9951">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9951">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9952">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9953">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9954">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9955">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9956">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9957">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9958">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9959">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9959">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9960">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9961">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9961">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9962">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9962">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9963">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9963">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9964">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9964">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9965">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9966">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9966">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9967">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9968">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9968">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9969">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9969">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9970">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9970">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9971">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9971">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-9972">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9972">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9996">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9996">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9997">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9997">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-9998">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9998">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-9999">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-9999">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10000">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10000">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10001">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10001">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10002">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10002">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10003">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10003">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10004">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10005">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10005">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10006">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10007">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10008">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10008">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10009">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10010">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10010">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10011">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10012">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10012">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10013">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10013">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10042">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10042">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10043">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10044">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10044">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10045">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10046">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10046">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10047">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10047">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10048">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10048">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10049">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10049">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10050">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10050">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10051">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10051">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10052">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10053">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10053">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10054">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10055">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10055">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10056">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10056">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10057">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10057">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10058">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10058">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10059">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10059">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10060">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10060">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10061">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10061">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10062">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10062">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10063">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10063">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10064">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10064">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10065">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10065">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10066">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10066">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10067">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10067">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10068">指定模式中七个或八个数字以及一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10068">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10069">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10069">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10070">拥有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10070">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10071">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10071">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10072">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10072">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10073">没有西班牙国家身份证的非居民西班牙人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10073">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10089">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10089">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10090">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10090">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10091">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10091">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10092">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10092">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10093">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10093">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10094">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10094">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10095">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10095">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10096">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10096">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10127">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10127">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10128">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10129">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10129">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10130">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10130">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10131">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10131">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10132">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10132">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10133">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10133">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10134">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10134">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10135">不是美元符号 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号为 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10135">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10136">7-128 个字符（不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10136">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10137">一个分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10137">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10138">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10138">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10139">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10139">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10140">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10140">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10141">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10141">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10142">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10142">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10143">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter **关键字** 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10143">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10144">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10144">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10145">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **找不到** 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10145">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10146">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10146">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10147">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10147">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10148">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10148">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10149">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10149">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10150">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10150">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10151">示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10151">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10152">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10152">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10153"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10153">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10154">密码或 pwd 后跟 0-2 个空格、等号 (=) 、0-2 个空格和星号 (\*) --OR--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10154">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10155">密码或 pwd 后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10155">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10156">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10156">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10157">小于符号 (<) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10157">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10158">大写或小写字母、数字、星号 (\*) 、连字符 (-) 、下划线 (_) 或空格字符的 1-200 个字符的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10158">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10159">大于符号 (>) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10159">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10160">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10160">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10161"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10161">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10165">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10165">sandbox</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10173">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10173">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10174">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10175">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10175">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10176">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10177">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10177">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10178">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10178">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10179">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10179">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10180">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10180">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10181">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10182">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10183">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10184">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10185">正则表达式查找  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10185">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10186">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10319">瑞典国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10319">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10320">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10320">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10321">10 位或 12 位和可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10321">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10322">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10322">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10323">10 位或 12 位以及可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10323">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10324">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10324">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10325">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10325">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10326">"-"或"+"分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10326">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10327">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10328">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10329">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10329">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10330">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10331">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10331">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10332">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10332">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10333">找到一个 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10333">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10334">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10334">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10335">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10336">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10336">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10337">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10337">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10356">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10356">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10357">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10357">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10358">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10359">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10359">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10360">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10361">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10361">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10362">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10363">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10363">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10364">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10365">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10366">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10366">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10367">下列情况之一为 true：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10367">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10368">找到Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10368">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10369">找到Keyword_sweden_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10369">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10400">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10400">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10401">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10401">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10402">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10402">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10403">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10403">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10404">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10404">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10405">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10405">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10406">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10406">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10407">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10408">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10408">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10409">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10410">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10410">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10411">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10411">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10412">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10412">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10413">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10413">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10414">对于 1990 之前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或外种人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10414">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10415">第九个位置的数字表示性别（对于男性或甚至对于男性）为奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10415">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10416">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10416">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10417">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10418">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10418">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10419">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10420">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10420">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10421">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10421">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10422">找到一个  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10422">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10423">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10424">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10424">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10450">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10450">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10451">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10452">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10452">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10453">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10454">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10454">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10455">四个字母银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10455">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10456">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10456">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10457">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10457">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10458">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10458">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10459">BBAN 代码的剩余部分 (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10459">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10460">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10461">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10461">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10462">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10463">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10464">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10464">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10465">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10465">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10502">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10502">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10503">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10503">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10504">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10504">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10505">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10505">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10506">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10506">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10507">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10507">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10508">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10508">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10509">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10509">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10510">13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10510">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10511">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10511">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10512">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10512">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10513">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10513">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10514">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10514">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10515">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10515">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10516">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10516">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10517">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10517">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10518">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10518">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10519">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10519">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10521">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10521">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10523">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10523">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10524">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10524">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10525">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10525">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10526">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10526">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10527">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10527">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10528">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10528">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_swiss_ssn_ahv_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10529">Keyword_swiss_ssn_AHV_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10529">Keyword_swiss_ssn_AHV_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10530">ahv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10530">ahv</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10531">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10531">ssn</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10548">台湾地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10548">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10549">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10550">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10550">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10551">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10552">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10552">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10553">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10553">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10554">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10554">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10555">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10555">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10556">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10557">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10558">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10559">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10559">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10560">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10560">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10561">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10561">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10562">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10563">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10563">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10564">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10564">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10565">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10568">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10568">身份證字號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10570">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10570">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10571">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10571">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10572">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10572">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10573">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10573">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10574">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10574">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10575">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10575">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10576">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10576">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10577">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10577">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10578">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10578">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10579">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10579">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10580">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10580">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10581">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10581">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10582">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10582">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10583">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10583">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10584">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10584">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10585">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10585">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10586">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10586">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10587">生物识别护照号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10587">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10588">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10588">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10589">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10589">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10590">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10590">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10591">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10591">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10592">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10593">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10593">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10594">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10595">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10595">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10596">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10596">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10597">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10597">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10598">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10598">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10599">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10599">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10601">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10601">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10602">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10602">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10603">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10603">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10604">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10604">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10605">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10605">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10606">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10606">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10607">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10607">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10608">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10608">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10609">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10610">十个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10610">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10611">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10612">十个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10612">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10613">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10613">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10614">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10614">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10615">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10616">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10616">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10617">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10618">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10618">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10619">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10619">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10620">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10620">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10621">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10621">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10622">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10622">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10623">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10623">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10624">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10624">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10625">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10625">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10626">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10626">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10627">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10627">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10628">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10628">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10629">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10629">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10630">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10630">TARC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10632">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10632">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10633">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10633">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10634">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10634">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10635">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10636">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10636">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10637">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10638">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10638">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10639">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10639">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10640">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10640">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10641">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10642">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10643">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10644">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10644">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10645">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10645">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10646">找到搜索Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10646">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10647">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10647">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10648">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10648">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10657">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10657">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10659">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10659">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10661">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10661">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10662">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10663">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10663">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10664">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10665">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10665">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10666">该函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10666">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10667">找到搜索Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10667">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10668">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10668">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10669">该函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10669">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
