## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10676">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10676">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10677">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10677">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10678">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10678">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10679">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10680">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10680">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10681">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10682">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10682">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10683">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10683">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10684">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10684">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10685">如果驱动程序是男性（即 51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12 位），则日期格式 MMDDY 中用于出生日期的五个数字 (第 7 个字符将递增 50) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10685">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10686">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10686">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10687">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10687">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10688">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10688">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10689">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10689">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10690">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10690">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10691">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10691">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10692">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10692">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10693">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10693">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10694">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10694">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10702">sidecar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10702">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10703">三周</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10703">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10704">一些</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10704">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10705">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10705">photocard licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10709">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10709">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10710">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10710">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10711">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10711">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10712">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10712">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10713">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10713">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10714">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10715">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10715">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10716">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10717">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10717">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10718">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10719">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10719">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10720">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10721">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10721">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10722">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10722">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10723">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10723">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10724">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10724">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10730">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10730">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10731">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10731">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10733">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10733">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10734">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10735">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10735">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10736">三个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10736">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10737">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10737">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10738">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10738">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10739">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10739">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10740">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10740">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10741">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10742">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10742">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10743">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10744">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10744">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10745">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10745">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10746">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10746">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10747">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10747">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10748">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10748">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10749">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10749">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10750">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10750">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10768">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10768">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10769">NINO 国家/ (号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10769">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10770">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/区域标识号敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10770">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10771">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10772">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10772">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10773">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10773">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10774">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10774">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10775">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10775">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10776">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10776">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10777">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10777">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10778">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10778">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10779">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10779">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10780">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10780">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10781">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10781">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10782">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10782">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10783">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10784">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10784">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10785">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10785">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10786">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10786">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10787">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10787">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10788">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10789">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10789">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10790">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10791">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10791">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10792">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10792">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10793">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10793">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10794">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10795">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10795">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10817">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10817">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10818">唯一的纳税参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10818">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10819">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10820">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10821">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10822">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10823">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10824">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10826">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10826">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10827">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10828">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10828">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10829">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10830">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10830">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10831">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10832">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10832">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10833">该  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10833">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10834">找到一个  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10834">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10854">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10854">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10855">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10855">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10856">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10856">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10857">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10858">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10858">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10859">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10859">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10860">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10860">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10861">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10861">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10862">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10862">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10863">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10863">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10864">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10864">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10894">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10894">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10895">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10896">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10896">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10897">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10898">取决于州 - 例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10898">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10899">9 个数字，格式设置为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10899">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10900">9 个数字（如 dddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10900">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10901">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10901">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10902">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10902">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-10903">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10903">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10904">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10904">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10905">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10905">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10906">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10906">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10907">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10907">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-10908">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10908">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10909">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10909">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10910">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10910">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10911">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10911">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-10912">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-10912">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11010">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11010">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11011">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11012">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11012">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11013">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11014">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11014">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11015">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11015">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11016">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11016">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11017">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11017">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11018">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11018">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11019">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11019">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11020">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11020">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11021">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11021">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11022">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11022">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11023">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11023">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11024">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11024">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11025">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11025">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11026">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11026">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11027">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11028">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11028">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11029">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11030">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11030">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11031">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11031">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11032">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11032">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11033">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11033">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11034">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11034">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11035">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11035">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11036">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11036">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11037">该函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11037">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11038">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11038">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11039">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11039">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11040">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11040">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11041">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11041">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11042">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11042">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11043">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11043">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11044">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11044">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11045">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11045">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11046">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11046">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11047">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11047">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11048">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11048">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11049">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11049">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11050">一些</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11050">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11051">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11051">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11052">SSN (美国社会保险号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11052">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11054">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11054">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11055">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11055">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11057">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11057">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11058">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11058">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11059">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11059">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11060">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11060">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11061">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11061">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11062">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11063">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11063">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11064">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11065">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11065">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11066">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11066">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11067">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11067">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11068">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11068">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11069">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11069">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11070">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11070">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11071">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11071">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11072">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11072">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11073">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11073">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11074">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11074">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11075">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11075">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11076">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11076">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11077">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11077">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11078">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11078">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11079">SSA 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11079">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11080">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11080">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11081">social security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11081">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11082">social security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11082">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11083">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11083">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11084">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11084">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11085">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11085">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11086">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11086">SSN</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11091">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11091">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11092">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11092">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11093">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11093">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11094">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11094">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11095">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11096">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11096">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11097">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11098">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11098">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11099">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11100">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11100">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11101">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11102">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11102">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11103">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11103">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11104">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11104">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11125">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11125">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11126">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11126">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11127">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11127">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11128">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11128">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11129">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11129">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11130">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11130">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11131">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11131">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11132">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11133">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11133">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11134">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11135">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11135">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11136">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11137">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11137">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11138">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11139">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11140">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11140">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11141">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11141">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11150">乌克兰护照国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11150">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11151">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11151">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11152">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11152">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11153">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11153">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11154">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11154">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11155">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11155">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11156">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11156">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11157">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11158">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11158">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11159">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11160">八字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11160">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11161">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11161">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11162">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11162">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11163">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11164">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="639c8-11165">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="639c8-11166">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11167">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11167">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="639c8-11168">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="639c8-11168">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
